value.title: Neural network detects protein-peptide binding sites to kick-start peptide drug discovery
value.excerpt: Two Skoltech researchers have presented a highly efficient neural network model that uses data on the structure of proteins to predict which of their parts interact with other biological molecules called peptides.

value.title: Meet Cassie, the first two-legged robot to set a running record using machine learning
